answers.answer: Dear pjtitch,I am not clear on what your question is. If your dog has an obstructed bile duct, it may require surgery to correct. In a 2 year old many aging-related diseases are unlikely. Has your doctor suggested a course of action?

question: After ultra sound my vet said that my dogs gallbladder is enlarged, she is off her food, keeps yawning but is otherwise ok. all blood test results are normal apart from a rise in liver enzymes by a count of 4 and a slight rise in glucose level but not enough for diabetes.
title: enlarged gallbladder, not eating
